body:
I just got tempbanned from this server and it says that I auto-clicker but I do not. :(
Well at least it was a tempban. :)

title: I Got Tembanned For No Reason :(

replies.body: But I really don't have auto-clicker.
replies.body_tagged: But I really don't have auto-clicker.

replies.body:
You may send an email to support@avicus.net if you wish to appeal.
That isn't really a reason to be unbanned, as anyone could just claim it isn't true.
